channel.title: Client Background
channel.description: Hey, I've tried looking but i can't find it. I keep trying to change my client background, however my client folders contain no sprites folder, so I can't access the background to edit it. I haven't had this problem on any other clients I've used, anyone know what I should do? Any help would be great, thanks. My client is for a 317 if that helps at all, forgot to say that.

item.title: Client Background
item.dc:creator: @willie2579 willie2579
item.description:
@willie2579 wrote:

Just download tom’s cache suite editor and change it that way.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Background
item.dc:creator: @acamp1221 acamp1221
item.description:
@acamp1221 wrote:

I know it shouldn’t be, I just said I looked to appease that one guy, I know I should just make a new one, delete the old one and use the exact same name, however the old one isn’t in client files anywhere, even with my pc showing all hidden files. So I do know what i need to replace, or just use photoshop and edit, but I can’t seem to find the file that I do need to edit or replace.

Read full topic

so simply take the background u made then replace it with the one u already have MAKE IT HAVE THE SAME NAME as the original[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 23, 2009, 11:32:46 am[/size][hr]oh btw ur client background pic shouldnt be in ur cache flder
